productDescription:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.

optionalInfo.material: This item is completely made out of GOTS certified organic cotton.
optionalInfo.fit:
De broek heeft een slim fit. Laurie draagt maat 38women/48men TALL en is 181cm lang.

Maten in CM:
36/46(-tall): heupomvang max.* 91cm, Binnenbeenlengte 67cm (77cm)
38/48(-tall): heupomvang max. 96cm, Binnenbeenlengte 67cm (77cm)
40/50(-tall): heupomvang max. 101cm, Binnenbeenlengte 68cm (78cm)
42/52(-tall): heupomvang max. 106cm, Binnenbeenlengte 68cm (78cm)
optionalInfo.care: Wash this piece on max 40°C, don’t bleach it, let it line dry, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
optionalInfo.production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: The short is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 1 -5 days on average.
